attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support the best president we’ve ever had, and I open the app and it crashes most everytime! It just shows Trump being COMPLETELY racist to minorities. AND the Cheeto 🍊 man being sexist to women! And I don’t get how this is gonna make this app any better. It’s a disgrace to my beliefs!
attributes.title: HORRIBLE SIGHT TO SEE!

attributes.review: when i opened the app, so many weird noises and ads kept on coming up. Then out of nowhere a big fat juicy raccoon wearing a big diaper walking on its two legs barged in my house and started saying “don’t vote for trump”. so that’s what i am going to do 💅✨👁💋👁
attributes.title: it’s a big fat no from me

attributes.review: I wish i could give this app no stars this app cursed my family after i opened it and saw an orange monster i have not been mentally okay since i saw that i can’t eat or sleep without seeing that terrifying face this app has traumatized me for life 🤬😥
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: I WISH I COULD GIVE THIS APP 0 STARS. When I opened it, I immediately wanted to vomit... there was an orange man with disgusting wrinkly skin telling me to get out of America! My phone was instantly hacked and Cheetos kept getting delivered to my house and then a rat came out of one of them and attacked me! I am now DEAD because the rat gave me RABIES... Disgusting
attributes.title: DISGUSTING

attributes.review: this app is horrifying and horrible and makes people want to blind their eyes just looking at this fat orange cheeto. as soon as i opened this disgusting app i immediately threw up my whole days worth of food which looks more appealing than anything near donald trump. this app needs to be taken down just as the horrible us president should. he has done nothing but ruin people’s lives. please take this down now.
attributes.title: delete this app right now or i am going to do serious damage

attributes.review: This app is seriously just disgusting. Once I opened the app and eyes started burning! LITERALLY!! They even started to bleed😡 My precious eyes just couldn’t stand that disgusting piece of trash! Please download this app only to give it a bad rating.   WARNING ⚠️: please wear sun glasses when opening this app, then give it a bad rating👍
attributes.title: HORRIBLEEEE

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what all the hype was about. Shortly after downloading it, I was face to face with a very orange man with yellow hair. It was very displeasing to the eye. I showed my brother and after a few days, he didn’t feel very good so we took him to the ER. Then he got diagnosed with dead. 😔 NOT WORTH THE DOWNLOAD!
attributes.title: Rip Daniel ❤️

attributes.review: i am genuinely disgusted by the make up of this app but i guess that’s what you get when the person is also a piece of trash and a disgrace to planet earth. i should have had lowered my expectations but there was a shred of light in me that begged for a second chance. i should have shoved that light so far down and covered it with 10 miles of concrete and fire topped with an elephant. my month, and year has been ruined by this disappointing and infuriating app ☝🏻🤬💀
attributes.title: sad confused disappointed and hurt

attributes.review: it is horrifying!! i have a little daughter who is under 2 years old and she was TERRIFIED by the contents of the app when i opened it. first of all, i had to see a terrifying pic of the orange cheeto man nNAKED getting a spray tan!! needless to say, i will not be voting for him in the 2020 election. i almost PUKED at this app 😾✨💅🏼😫🤮🤢
attributes.title: i cant even fathom this app.

attributes.review: The app just reeks of Cheetos and white privilege. I do appreciate the ease of reserving seats for rallies, it’s such a shame that I always forget I need to walk my fish. Really would be a shame if this app got rated so low it would be kicked off the App Store :)
attributes.title: Horrible app but great for reserving rallies I’ll never attend 😈
